replies.msg: My friend Stephen is an accounting manager at Hilton. If he takes the job at Big 4, he'll be four thousand eight hundred dollars a month better off but he's still better off now than he was two years ago when he was working beneath everyone else in the department. He thinks a junior accountant position is beneath him. If he hadn't taken the CPA exam two years previously, he wouldn't be working as a manager now. If he had pursued a career in sales rather than accounting, his salary would be much lower. If it hadn't been for his auntie's referral to Hiltonx his career wouldnt take off now and he wouldnt start earning a lot of money. He's been having a crush on this girl named Jo for eight years but Jo has a boyfriend. His friend said "That's totally fair. She's quite attractive." But he's beginning to realize he has no place in her scheme of things. He's just being a doormat so I told him to forget her. She's just not worth it. His uncle said "You would be better off without her." His mother too said "You'll be better off without her." Stephen is a science fiction fan. He said "If starships really would exist, I would quit my job and spend the rest of my life roaming the universe." Recently, his sister married her childhood sweetheart. Her father felt she was marrying beneath her though. Her uncle too feels her husband is beneath her. She enjoys socializing with the better off. Last month, Stephen was away on a business trip to Hokkaido. After his trip, I said "If you should travel there again, can you get me a pack of White Lover Cookies please?" Stephen is a computer expert. His cousin has to wrote a report which is due on Tuesday but she's having problems with her computer. If Stephen will go and fix her computer, she'll be so thankful for his help. She also has exams next Monday so she's better off revising at home over the weekend. Stephen is a kickboxing fan. His favorite fighter Dan has won his retirement fight lately. Dan is eternally grateful to his coaches and thankful that he's got a job as a color commentator after he retired from the sport. All the fans wanna see Fred versus Randy. If Fred would sign a contract with the organization, Dana will make the fight happen. When Randy was reading the terms and conditions of the contract, Dana's assistant said "If you would just sign here please." Stephen's brother is a concierge in a hotel. I said "If it'll make you happy, I'll come to stay for a night as company for you while your colleagues are away." My friend Paul isn't very well-to-do while his girlfriend's family is very well-off. Last week, he gave a party at his place where cheap wines were served. The sofas in his flat are made of some cheap material. His television is cheap and nasty. As many of us wanted to watch the news, I said "If I could turn the television on please." He then said "Sure. If you would switch to the news channel." I saw Joey live twice at the Hong Kong Coliseum with my friends which was marvelous and unforgettable. The first time we saw her concert, we were late. I remember I said "Look at the time. The concert will have begun." It was quarter after eight. The concert would've started by then. By the end of the next century, scientists will have invented starships. As I'm fascinated by the science of starships, I'm going to ask physics professor Dr. Chow about it. I'm gonna wait outside the lecture room at five of six. He will have finished his lecture. I thought about phoning him at twenty of two but my friend said "Don't phone him now. He won't have finished his lecture yet." It's true that he wouldn't have finished teaching yet.

有得揀我寧願拎哂d錢去養豬, 起水廠, 開礦, 又或者賣電比中電, 呢個世界有好多好有意思既野等住我地去做, on99中個頭埋黎只會比人利用你做一世高薪既奴隸

replies.msg:
見到有人想透過mba入ibank
好啦後退多一步黎諗
受BB ibank 青睞/認可嘅mba 好多時候都需要你有工作經驗先入到
例如sloan/harvard平均都有五年工作經驗
https://mitsloan.mit.edu/mba/admissions/class-2021-profile
咁當你做咗五年之後想去報mba
除咗要百幾萬之外你仲要諗其他嘢例如考gmat砌statement/profile
當你付出晒呢啲時間同金錢成本之後
我當你真係咁好彩拎到名校mba
之後就要諗吓到嗰陣時你係咪真係有信心可以打低你嘅同行對手？老實講好多人（特別係內地人）係讀最有名嗰幾間mba之後報FO summer associate
然後嗰班人好多時候仲要有相關工作經驗再報summer associate (例如做2nd/3rd tier公司嘅相關工作）
你嘅對手就係嗰一班人
例如下面呢啲
https://www.linkedin.com/in/chris-zou-yun-07056116
https://www.linkedin.com/in/serena-yoon-b833612b

俾啲實際數據你 我嗰間美資BB Equity Research summer associate(mba quali）Hong Kong office淨係請咗一個 s&t好似有兩個 佢哋之前全部都做過相關嘅工作 例如係中/日資投行research/s&t associate

我勸大家唔好成日諗嘢諗到咁簡單
考慮多啲時間、金錢成本同埋成功機會
咁當然啦我自己一個FO associate small potato講嘢都不能完全作準 我只係將我知道嘅嘢講返出嚟 你成功失敗與否其實同我無關 我純粹出於好心

順帶一提如果想做summer associate 其實好多finance master 都可以做到...金錢成本都比mba平...不過你就要同一班比較勁嘅undergrad去競爭了

replies.msg:
經PWMA 入的intern 的人數多過正統direct apply private bank 的intern 的人好多, 而PWMA apprentice對candidate考核的能力要求/selection process係遠比direct entry PB intern 的candidate低好多, 無咁多assessment 要做。

之前在linkedin 度見到有唔少非3大 BBA marketing/finance 的女仔, GPA唔算好標青, 佢地做過UBS/CS 的private banking/wealth management intern, 聽佢地講, 話呢D programme 收人相對較多，但final year 的return offer 一定係俾正統intern 的人先 (假設大家在intern 期間的工作能力一樣)。

呢D intern 最好就係在year 1/2 的summer 做, year 3 就報BB summer intern。但個人覺得, 如果你好明確自已一定係aim ibank 做equity research/IBD 為主, 咁就應該寧願做細行/中資券商IBD/M&A/research 的經驗好過做PWMA 的intern. 始終工作的relevant exp >>> bank name.

當然對於某些人來講, 個人目標/興趣係傾向做ibank S&T 又或者只係想aim 入corp bank 做MT/GT, 咁就PWMA 的經驗好過細行IBD/research 的。
